name: Factory Wars
description:
A game created during the Climate game jam of Hakatah ! With a friend, you can compete as the nuclear industry or the good ol' oil companies for the supremacy of the land. But beware of natural disasters, some forces are indomitable.

Teammates :

Babilotte Joffrey - Graphic Designer

Audigier Jérôme - Team Manager

Morel Tom - Sound Designer

Thomas Suzanne - Game Designer / Level Designer

Lecorre Erwann - Graphic Designer

Deschamps Christopher - Development

Philipperon Jérôme - Game Designer / Level Designer

Jacquemin Gaêtan - Game Designer / Level Designer
